steps.title: Wait for the perfect time to say your science pick up line.
steps.content: Wait for the perfect time to say your science pick up line. Timing is everything when it comes to delivering pick up lines, so feel the flow of the conversation before making your move. steps.title: Donâ€™t overthink things and have fun delivering your line.
steps.content: Donâ€™t overthink things and have fun delivering your line.
